description:
In Hue you explore a dangerous grey land, unearthing coloured fragments on a journey to find your missing mother. As obstacles match the background, they disappear, creating new and exciting puzzles - full of peril, mystery… and colours unseen.

KEY FEATURES

•	Unique colour-matching mechanic, offering a new twist on the classic adventure game.
•	Full colourblind support, using symbols as a colour aid.
•	Fully remappable controller layout (exclusive to
Nintendo Switch™ on consoles)
•	A heartfelt story that touches on themes of love, loss, existence and remorse.
•	A world that is full of lively characters to talk to, each with their own personality and story.
•	Stark silhouetted art style with bright, bold colours.
•	Over 30 original music tracks, composed exclusively for Hue. 
•	Professionally voiced narration by Anna Acton and Matthew Wade, some of the UK’s best television talent.
name: Hue
